participant_1.background:
My parents are supportive of my career as a translator.
I spend my free time training and relaxing.
i am a mom with two sons and a husband.
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

participant_2.background:
I once got to see the Red Hot Chili Peppers in concert! It was an amazing experience.
i like playing games online.
my favorite animals are dolphins.
I am proud of my ability to create designs that people love and use in their everyday lives.
my girlfriend tells me she s going to leave me almost every day.

content.text: Hi there! I am a translator and a mom of two sons.
Hi! Wow that sounds like a lot of responsibility. How do you balance it all?
I try to take some time for myself each day, whether it's training or relaxing. I also like to spend time with my mom and enjoy nature.
That sounds great. It's important to take care of yourself. I like to play games online and spend time with my dog.
Dolphins! They're so smart and playful.
I love dolphins too! I think they're amazing creatures.
Me too. I once got to see the Red Hot Chili Peppers in concert. It was an amazing experience.
Wow, that must have been so cool! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
It was! They put on an amazing show.
I'm glad you got to experience that.
Thanks! I am proud of my ability to create designs that people love and use in their everyday lives.
That's wonderful! I'm sure it's a lot of hard work, but it sounds very rewarding.
It is, but it's worth it. I like to see people enjoying the things I've created.
I'm sure they do! It sounds like you have a lot of great things going on in your life.
I do! I'm very grateful for everything.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're doing well.
